citations.narrative:
There is a broken metal gate post in a pen containing sheep and lambs. Further, the spacing between posts is large
enough to allow lambs to fit through the enclosure as multiple lambs were feeding on hay immediately outside the
enclosure. Broken posts may injure animals and pens insufficient to contain animals predispose animals to escape and
injury or loss. Housing facilities must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to minimize risk of injury and to
adequately contain the animals.
Correct by March 5, 2024.

Unopened bags of food stored in the sheep barn are contaminated with bird droppings. Food contamination may
predispose sheep to illness. Supplies of food should be stored so as to adequately protect against contamination.
Correct by March 5, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
There is a broken metal gate post in a pen containing sheep and lambs. Further, the spacing between posts is large 
enough to allow lambs to fit through the enclosure as multiple lambs were feeding on hay immediately outside the 
enclosure. Broken posts may injure animals and pens insufficient to contain animals predispose animals to escape and 
injury or loss. Housing facilities must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to minimize risk of injury and to 
adequately contain the animals. 
 
Correct by March 5, 2024. 
3.125(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
Unopened bags of food stored in the sheep barn are contaminated with bird droppings. Food contamination may 
predispose sheep to illness. Supplies of food should be stored so as to adequately protect against contamination.  
 
Correct by March 5, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
